frontmatter.title: ETHIndia/Bangalore Days
frontmatter.description: For the First Time,I attended my First Hackathon in Bangalore and it was an international Hackathon called ETHIndia. Wew,it was actually really awesome to visit Bangalore and Hack on something I dont know anything about
